title: Baht Oyunu
overview: Once you believe that your fortunes are black, it is not easy to beat the fortunes... However, Ada, who believes that if they marry the first men they love, they will achieve happiness and has not succeeded, is about to put an end to this, to put the stick in the wheel of fate... What happens is that Ada is abandoned by Ruzgar, which she believes is her first love. As Ada seeks to win back Ruzgar on the path of happiness, Bora confronts her. Trapped between love and faith, Ada is waiting for a difficult and romantic journey
